abstract: Turborepo patterns, shared packages, cross-package development, and workspace conventions for the Createconomy monorepo. Covers 4 Next.js apps (marketplace, forum, admin, seller), 5 shared packages (ui, types, config, utils, convex), pnpm workspace protocol, Turborepo task configuration, development commands, shared package development patterns, code quality workflow, environment variables, and CI/CD pipeline integration.
